tweetInfo.author: Louis Tomlinson
tweetInfo.text: Happy birthday mate @LiamPayne . Have a great day!

author: Genshin Impact
text:
Ah, there you are! *coughs* Is there something you have come to the Great Astrologist Mona for?

Oh, you brought snacks? Thank you!

Well then, maybe we should look for a place where we can enjoy this delicacy and admire the starry sky together. I already have a place in my head. https://t.co/d51gXCMiQF
